titles: By the Mayor, Martis nono die Martij 1668, annoq, Regis Caroli Secundi dei gratia Angli√¶ &c. decimo nono
author: City of London (England).
notes: Concerns appraisers of orphans' estates--NUC pre-1956 imprints.

First line of text reads: It is thought fit and ordered by this court that in the appointment of appraisers regard be had to the honesty and integrity of the persons and their judgment, skill and experience in the goods to be appraised ...
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
